text: Raúl Oscar Becerra (born October 1, 1987 in Río Gallegos, Argentina) is an Argentine-born Chilean footballer who currently plays for Deportivo Cuenca. ==Teams== * Sportivo Santa Cruz 2006 * Juventud Alianza 2007–2008 * Boca Río Gallegos 2009 * Huracán de Tres Arroyos 2010 * Juventud de Pergamino 2010–2011 * Almagro 2011–2012 * Nueva Chicago 2012–2013 * Argentinos Juniors 2013–2014 * Colón de Santa Fe 2014–2015 * Deportivo Cuenca 2016 * Everton 2017 * Deportes Iquique 2018 * Deportivo Cuenca 2019–2020 * Umm Salal 2020 ==Titles== * Boca Río Gallegos 2009 (Torneo Argentino C Championship) ==External links== * Profile at BDFA * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean expatriate footballers Category:Club Almagro players Category:Boca Río Gallegos footballers Category:Huracán de Tres Arroyos footballers Category:Juventud de Pergamino footballers Category:Nueva Chicago footballers Category:Argentinos Juniors footballers Category:Club Atlético Colón footballers Category:C.D. Cuenca footballers Category:Everton de Viña del Mar footballers Category:Deportes Iquique footballers Category:Umm Salal SC players Category:Chilean Primera División players Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Ecuadorian Serie A players Category:Qatar Stars League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Chile Category:Expatriate footballers in Ecuador Category:Expatriate footballers in Qatar Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Chile Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Ecuador Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Qatar Category:Argentine people of Chilean descent Category:Naturalized citizens of Chile Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Raúl Becerra
